review_text: We loved our stay here while in Helena for a wedding - very peaceful and relaxing by the creek with the hot tub & outdoor seating in the mountain setting. Truly the Montana vibe! The hosts were very responsive. Great stay!

After a long day, we got burgers just 2 minutes up the road. Then we checked into the absolutely spectacular brand new modern, private, tiny-but-didn't-feel-tiny home. It's right off the mountain road, but once you were inside or in the yard you barely noticed. (And not a lot of traffic on a Saturday-Sunday stay!) My daughter roasted all the marshmallows at the fire pit without sharing, so although my son and I were mad about that, you made her happy. The stars up there... just wow.
